text: Csongrád-Csanád is an administrative county in Hungary. The capital of Csongrád-Csanád county is Szeged. It is in the southern part of the country. It is on the border with Serbia and Romania. It borders with the Hungarian counties of Bács-Kiskun, Békés and Jász-Nagykun-Szolnok. In 2019, 399,012 people lived there. Its area is 4,263 km².
title: Csongrád-Csanád County
